display_long_description:
🚗 Assemble a car with your own hands in your garage or anywhere, and get inside to experience it!

ARCarCraft Car Assembly & Experience is an automotive design experience platform specifically created for the Meta Quest platform. Through immersive 3D environments and advanced MR technology, it allows users to conduct 1:1 realistic car assembly and operation training in mixed reality spaces.

🌟 Core Highlights
🔧 Interactive, Immersive Assembly Mode
• High-precision 3D car models (GLC, SU7, Tank500, etc.)
• Authentic parts assembly experience - every component matters
• Visual process diagrams that make complex assembly simple
• Intelligent assembly detection ensuring operational accuracy

🎮 Interactive Experience Mode
• Real steering wheel control experience
• Interactive functional components like doors, lights, windshield wipers
• Engine startup simulation - feel the heartbeat of the automobile

🎯 Smart Guidance, Progressive Experience
• Three difficulty levels: from beginner to expert
• Guided mode for quick onboarding even for newcomers
• Real-time progress tracking with learning outcomes at a glance
• Multi-language support for barrier-free learning worldwide

🎨 Audio-Visual Feast
• Cinema-grade visual effects and dynamic lighting
• 3D spatial audio for immersive sound experience
• Rich visual effect feedback

Download now and begin your new era of automotive learning!
Make complex automotive technology simple and fun, master real skills in the virtual world.
